p: The pharmacokinetics parameters of the beta-sitosterol compound was analysed based on Lipinskiâ€™s rule of five and assessed by QikProp (Schrodinger Maestro, version 11.1) [ 59]. This application can measure the pharmacokinetic and physicochemical properties with molecular weight, hydrogen bond donor, hydrogen bond acceptor, high lipophilicity (Log P) and rotatable bonds of compounds.
